data:query.name: Query 1
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT id, guinvid, invoiceno, invoicedate ::date, batchno, duedate::date, round(CAST(currentcharge as numeric),2) as currentcharge, subtotal, discount, retailprice , round(CAST(taxtotal as numeric),2) as taxtotal, guaccountid, accountno, stb, vc, gucustid, gupromotionid, promotioncode, promotionname, round(CAST(adjustment as numeric),2) as adjustment, round(CAST(closing as numeric),2) as closing, round(CAST(opening as numeric),2) as opening, round(CAST(payment as numeric),2) as payment, printdescription, round(CAST(totalprice as numeric),2) as totalprice, qty, unitprice, uom, billrunstartdate::date, billrunenddate::date, guproductid, productcode, productname, gudealerid, dealercode, dealername, dealeraddress, dealerpincode, dealerphoneno, customercode, customername, customeraddress, customerpincode, custphoneno, tenantid, companyid, viewobjectid FROM rep_invoiceprintbybatch_tbl WHERE guinvid = ${RefID} ORDER BY guinvid
